Pre-Game Insights: India has a formidable squad and will enter the match as favourites.
USA has already staged an upset once in the T20 World Cup 2024 and is looking in good form.
The Men in Blue have looked in sublime form in the T20 World Cup 2024.
USA shocked the world when they managed to defeat Pakistan after having won against neighbours Canada in the tournament opener.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York pitch has come under scrutiny for being below par.
The match will take place during daytime (local time) and the maximum temperature is expected to be around 25°C with no serious threat of rain.
Others: Rohit Sharma will open the innings and can score quickly.
Virat Kohli is a proven contender and it’s only a matter of time before he gets going.
Hardik Pandya will contribute with the bat as well as the ball.
Aaron Jones has been in outstanding form recently and can score quick runs.
Jasprit Bumrah will bowl in the powerplay as well as the death overs.
Shivam Dube might not get too many opportunities in the match and hence can be excluded from this game.
Jasdeep Singh might not be as effective and can be avoided for this game.
